maxDepth.title: Maximum crawl depth
maxDepth.description: Start URL has depth 0. All resources linked from it have depth 1 and so on.

maxResources.title: Maximum resources
maxResources.description: Maximum number of resources to be crawled per each individual site.

delay.title: Crawl delay
delay.description: Delay in miliseconds between fetching two consecutive resources.

hostnameRe.title: Domain regexp filter
hostnameRe.description: Based on URL hostname, filter which html pages should be queued for scraping. Leave empty to only add resources from the same domain (including subdomains). Ex: /\.org$/ only links from .org domains will be scraped.

pathnameRe.title: Pathname regexp filter
pathnameRe.description: Based on URL pathname, filter which html pages should be queued for scraping. Leave empty to add all links. Ex: /product/ - only links like extra-product-extra.html will be scraped. Ex: /category\/product/ - only links like extra-category/product-extra.html will be scraped.
